mapper.select: SELECT pm.* FROM project_members pm JOIN students s ON pm.student_id = s.id JOIN accounts a ON s.account_id = a.id WHERE a.id=#{aId} and pm.project_id=#{id}

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.description, p.creator_id, s.name as creator_name, p.class_id, c.name as class_name, p.status, p.review_status, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM projects p JOIN students s ON p.creator_id = s.id JOIN classes c ON p.class_id = c.id WHERE p.id=#{id}
